Artist: Various Artists 
Music Genre: Folk 
Resource Format: APE 
Version: [CRC sing Shanghai] [20CDs] 
Released: 2005 
Country: China 


Chinese folk music has a long history, genre everywhere. 20th century emerged in a number of outstanding composer, performer. To carry forward the Chinese national culture, China Record Shanghai Corporation will introduce the "Chinese Folk Music Masters Series", a full set of 20 CD. The series featuring the music of the musicians are our national masterpieces best.


*Scans of all 20 CDs are inside. This is Flac in APE. Tags are in Chinese so don't bother to request 'proper' tracklist. I can only translate using Google Translator.*

Tracklist:
__

CD 1: Xiaodi player - Zhang Weiliang

ISRC: CN-E01-04-450-00 / A.J6
The disc is a collection of well-known contemporary Xiao Zhang Weiliang played flute virtuoso works.
Famous Xiao, flute virtuoso Zhang Weiliang, 1983 creation of flute solo 'Lake Spring "won the China Conservatory first award. 1987 performance of "painting" by the International Broadcasting Foundation awards, and has served as the film "Ju Dou," "Farewell My Concubine", "Emperor and the Assassin" and other films in the solo.

The album:
01. Autumn Bells (flute)
02. near the dressing table (flute)
03. geese (flute)
04. Taihu spring (flute)
05. Xunfeng song (flute)
06. Riverside (harp, flute)
07. three hundred fifty-seven (flute)
08. South rhyme (flute)
09. Indus month (flute)
10. Meihuasannong (flute)


CD 2: gaohu player - Yu Qiwei

ISRC: CN-E01-04-0087-00 / A.J6
The dish included a high contemporary Hu Yu Qiwei played home played works.
A high Hu Yu Qiwei playing piano playing family inherited the traditional Chinese folk music advocate. Develop the Guangdong gorgeous lyrical music, Brisk and lively features, rich literature of fantasy and deep philosophy, the realm of the beautiful and elegant, known as "profound ideological and artistic skills of talented performers.

The album:
01. Liulangwenying
02. Investment forest birds

CD 3: erhu - Xu morals

ISRC: CN-E01-04-450-00 / A.J6
The dish included contemporary erhu playing at home playing the works of Xu morals.
Xu morals decades of artistic career has introduced new tracks from her debut solo erhu up to a dozen first, gradually formed its own unique artistic style; feelings of sincere, simple, pure tone, rich, with strong The singing is prefer to give "Cantabile into the situation, intimate sounds." Xu also speaks German opera arias and instrumental attempt turned into a successful exploration, called the erhu field a must.

The album:

CD 4: guzheng virtuoso - Andean item

ISRC: CN-E01-04-446-00 / A.J6
The disc included the zither virtuoso contemporary Andean played key works.
The guzheng virtuoso item Swarovski, in the long-term artistic practice and innovation, drawing on the piano and harp playing technique, so zither playing skills to develop, significantly enrich the expressiveness of the instrument of the zither. Her playing, both with western music style, but also has a strong Chinese style.

The album:

CD 5: Erhu - Min Huifen

ISRC: CN-E01-04-0086-00 / A.J6
The disc included the famous erhu Min Huifen contemporary works played.
Min Huifen playing passionate, both the faces and voices of the music digging for meaning, to the delicate art of handling, moving the piano there are artistic charm. Her performance in the long-term practice, the formation of a warm and inclusion, rather than pro-moving, without exaggeration mad, sad without injury playing style.

The album:
01. River Water
02. hi send public grain
